data.eml:eml: Nomenclatural and taxonomic status of bird taxa (Aves) described by an ornithological swindler, Josef Prokop Pražák (1870 – 1904)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mlíkovský, Jiří (2011): Nomenclatural and taxonomic status of bird taxa (Aves) described by an ornithological swindler, Josef Prokop Pražák (1870 – 1904). Zootaxa 3005: 45-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202788
